alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 1:38PM CST until January 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Little Cypress Creek near Becker Road affecting Harris County. For the Little Cypress Creek...including Becker Road...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Cypress Creek NEAR Becker Road. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 194.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 196.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 194.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 745 AM CST.
